section: You are washed up on to a pebble beach. A wall of fog hangs out to sea, encircling the island you have been washed up on in a thick miasma of cloying mist. Inland, it is clear of fog. A hot sun beats down on a hazy, buzzing jungle. A tree-covered mountain rises up out of the vegetation. You have been washed up on the Isle of Mystery. .
